extendedInfo.description: StarCraft Byte (terran) is a sound clip application for android phones, contains sound clip of all Star Craft 2 units:BansheeBattle-CruiserGhostHellionMarauderMarineMedivacMULERavenReaperSCVSiege TankThorViking********** Read me first **********all starcraft and starcraft 2 logo/s, image/s, audio/s & character/s are properties of its respective owner, the developer does not take credit for any of those mentioned above, and any third party files used in making this application like images and sound effects are also properties of their respective owners.All trademarks referenced herein are the properties of their respective owners. Â©2011 All rights reserved.******************************************** Notice **********This application is the same as the old StarCraft Byte(Terran), with the patch 1.2 included, due to some problems during development, i had to unpublish and deactivate the old application and had to upload a new one, in short this now  is the permanent application, so you can now uninstall the old application and download this one instead. If the audio for any units happens to not play after pressing the button just return to the main menu and just access the said button again and it will play now, just a minor glitch in the system, and a very easy solution is to just re access that page again just by going back and again, i no longer make sense so just have fun with it! :DStarCraft Byte "by a fan for the fans"****************************

reviews.title: Good but needs work
reviews.comment: The sound board has alot more sounds then the other boards available. But you can\'t save them. And the 30.mb is too much take the background music out
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Installation problems insufficient space fixed
reviews.comment: I finally installed it this time round, installed to sd card with 14gb free fine (had to root my phone to do this). I then went to download the zerg one and it said insufficient space! so i guessed temp memory or ram was the problem i had 82mb free internal mem just in case. So I used Advanced task killer to kill all apps running then downloaded & installed Zerg no problem,
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best StarCraft 2 soundboard available. Only thing keeping it from perfection is the inability to save as notifications.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent, I\'ll Give It 5 Stars If The FreakingTakePlaces BackGround Music Is Removed Because Its Useless And Disappointly Increase The Space To 32MB.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s great
reviews.comment: It needs the sound save option and make the unit icons animated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: You cant see the buttons for the characters and my sound started acting funny after i downloaded it
reviews.author: Derek Noe

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Great sounds but are you ever going to update it at all so we can save them for ringtones
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Complete soundboard but can\'t use the sounds as ringtones. Please fix
reviews.author: Steven Malca

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Useless background music and no function of setting notifications. But still good if you only want to listen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too large size and lacking quality.
reviews.comment: There are better ones out there which includes all races with less memory ;o
reviews.author: A Google User
